data.comment: The referee blows his whistle to start the first-half. Oud-Heverlee with the kick-off.
In the minute 45, The first half has been concluded at Guldensporenstadion.
Petar Golubovic is replacing Lucas Rougeaux for the home team.
The second half is underway in Kortrijk - Kortrijk with the kick-off.
Oud-Heverlee take a 0-1 lead thanks to Thomas Henry.
In the minute 49, Petar Golubovic (Kortrijk) gets a yellow card.
Kortrijk make their second substitution with Faiz Selemani replacing Michiel Jonckheere.
The away team have replaced Moussa Al-Taamari with Daan Vekemans. This is the first substitution made today by Marc Brys.
In the minute 64, Goal! Thomas Henry extends Oud-Heverlee lead to 0-2 with a header.
At Guldensporenstadion, Sascha Kotysch has been yellow-carded for the away team.
The home team replace Hannes Van Der Bruggen with Yevhen Makarenko.
In the minute 72, Marc Brys (Oud-Heverlee) is making a second substitution, with Dylan Ouedraogo replacing Kristiyan Malinov.
Goal! Thomas Henry extends Oud-Heverlee's lead to 0-3.
The match has come to a close in Kortrijk. The final score is 0-3.
Olivier Myny is on a sub for Xavier Mercier for Oud-Heverlee.
